Description
[/size][/i][/b]
[size=3]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[/size][size=3]
This is a standalone MOD to change appearance of Cicero (Only above the neck).



[/size][i][size=4][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/i][size=3]

[/size]Only Skyrim.
[b][i][size=4]

[/size][/i][/b][b][i][size=4]How to Install[/size][/i][/b]

Maually install or Use the NMM.[/font][/center][center][font=Times New Roman]

[size=4][b][i]
How to remove Cicero's Cap
[/i][/b][/size]
[size=3]1. Press [`] key

[/size][/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]2. Click on the Cicero

3.  Enter 'inv'

4. Enter 'removeitem 0006492E 1'
[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=2]( sorry....I don't know that how to remove Cicro's cap in CK tool....;_; )[/size][/font]
